subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: With time running out to qualify for the Masters, Davis Love III shot six under in a five-hole stretch, then finished strong to grab a share of the lead at the Arnold Palmer Invitational.
snippet: With time running out to qualify for the Masters, Davis Love III shot six under in a five-hole stretch, then finished strong to grab a share of the lead at the Arnold Palmer Invitational.
